Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Enterprise companies starting the transformation into a data-driven organization ​often ​​wonder where to start. One of the first data science projects ​worth exploring is segmentation​, which automatically identifies​ patterns. In this webinar <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=971942&s=1&k=D8A8274FB7BB17F81C6365C125C789D9&partnerref=Pivotal>, two Pivotal data scientists will discuss:
- What segmentation is - Traditional approaches to segmentation - How big data technologies are enabling advances in this field
Join us <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=971942&s=1&k=D8A8274FB7BB17F81C6365C125C789D9&partnerref=Pivotal> to learn about the kinds of insights ​that can be derived from a big data approach to segmentation, using both internal and external data sources.
REGISTER >>
We look forward to seeing you there, The Pivotal Team THE SCIENCE OF SEGMENTATION
